name: nuxt-app
_comment0: Some error when adding i18n told me to add type: module. But that didn't remove the error
_comments_on_scripts: 1. Calling it 'upload', bc 'deploy' seems to be reserved in pnpm
2. To test deployment version, run `generate`, then follow instructions in terminal to serve locally.
comments_on_pnpm_overrides: - Nuxt has been pretty painful, and I'm almost certain has caused way more trouble than the value it provides.
- This lead me to investigate vanilla js and discover modern browser does everything that react/vue does with 50 lines of helper functions – See note `Idea - quote-unquote-framework` [Nov 2025]

- We could also remove NuxtImg. The only useful thing it seems to do is compress images (more than 10x on the color-spash images). But I could get even better compression using `pngquant --quality=65-80 color-splash-dark-1.png`
